target_tissue: retinal ganglion cell layer / epiretinal surface
key_papers: Ho et al. 2015 (3-year results, PMC4516690); da Cruz et al. 2016 (5-year results, Ophthalmology)
notes: FDA HDE approval for RP; major epiretinal platform.

key_papers: Canonical early Argus I clinical papers: TBD
notes: Predecessor to Argus II; include as separate platform family.
Wireless intraocular epiretinal device evaluated in a prospective trial.

device_name: IRIS II / IRIS V2 Intelligent Retinal Implant System
notes: Epiretinal array platform; include as distinct from PRIMA photovoltaic.

key_papers: Stingl et al. 2013 (PMC3619489); Stingl et al. 2015 (Vision Research)
notes: Wirelessly powered subretinal photodiode array; landmark subretinal platform.

key_papers: Stingl et al. 2017 (PMC5572402); Edwards et al. 2018 (PMC5818267)
notes: Technically advanced successor to Alpha IMS; interim multicenter trial publications exist.

aliases: PRIMA System, Pixium Vision PRIMA; later Science Corp-associated
key_papers: Muqit et al. 2023 (PMC10680875); Muqit et al. 2024 (Ophthalmology Science)
notes: Wireless photovoltaic central-vision restoration (e.g., GA/dry AMD).
Early subretinal microchip; distinct from later high-electrode-count systems.

device_name: First-generation Suprachoroidal Retinal Prosthesis (BVA Phase I)

aliases: Bionic Vision Technologies 44-channel suprachoroidal; CERA/Bionics Institute-related
notes: 44-channel second-gen suprachoroidal device with longer follow-up.

device_name: MiViP / Optic Nerve Visual Prosthesis (ONVP) cuff electrode
aliases: optic nerve cuff prosthesis, Veraart/Delbeke optic nerve prosthesis
key_papers: Veraart et al. early reports (2003) + follow-ups: TBD
notes: Chronic self-sizing cuff with few contacts; reports of phosphenes + basic pattern recognition.

device_name: Intraorbital optic nerve stimulating electrode (case report technique)
notes: Surgical approach for implanting a stimulating electrode around intraorbital optic nerve.

device_name: AV-DONE (Artificial Vision by Direct Optic Nerve Electrode)
aliases: AV-DONE, direct optic disc/optic nerve electrode
implant_class: optic nerve / optic disc (penetrating wire electrodes)
key_papers: Quiroz-Mercado et al. AV-DONE reports: TBD
notes: Direct wire electrodes implanted at optic disc; very rare approach.
